## Overview

This lab introduces agentic AI patterns and workflow systems integration with web applications.

## Learning Objectives

By completing this lab, you will:

1. Design **agent-based workflows**
2. Implement **basic AI agents**
3. Integrate **LangChain/similar frameworks**
4. Handle **agent-human interaction**
